title: Build Ecological Wind Tunnels
description: Create artificial ecosystems that more closely mimic real-world complexity to rigourous test the function and safety of engineered organisms.

title: AI + Massively Parallel Experiments
description: Combine big experiments with rigorous metrology and advanced AI to create the genetic tools needed to reprogram diverse and environmentally important microbes.

title: Improved Cyber-Bio Security
description: Improve the cyber-bio security of engineered cells to enable their traceability in natural environments and ensure trustworthy cell products that can be safely deployed into the wild.
